footer.description: Measure and improve software delivery performance with our comprehensive assessment tool.

newsletter.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
newsletter.subtitle: Get product updates, best practices, and insights right to your inbox.

usage.title: How it works
usage.subtitle: Assess, analyze, and improve your software delivery performance in four simple steps.

1.title: Answer the questions
1.desc: Complete a short questionnaire across the Ten Factors to evaluate your current practices.

2.title: Receive your score
2.desc: Instantly get a detailed score with strengths and areas to improve.

3.title: Review best practices
3.desc: Explore actionable recommendations and best practices tailored to your results.

4.title: Track improvements
4.desc: Implement changes and track progress over time to continuously improve.
